title: Cryptographer
body:
Company Description

SGS Digital Trust Services provides Cybersecurity research, testing and certification services. Working in partnership with Graz University of Technology (TU Graz) at the Cybersecurity Campus Graz, we operate one of the world's largest Cyber security evaluation labs where security experts focus on testing and certification of digital products, networked systems and online services.


Job Description

The Cryptographer will analyse the security of cryptographic applications, protocols, implementations and designs on devices and components.

You Will:

  • Assess the security of cryptographic applications, protocols, implementations and designs;
  • Assess the compliance of a product or system according to various standards and certification;
  • Analyse products under test conditions;
  • Develop new tools for future security assessments.

Qualifications
  • Masters or PhD in Cryptography or a similar field;
  • Background in asymmetric and symmetric cryptography;
  • Knowledge of cryptographic protocols;
  • Expertise in the implementation of cryptographic primitives;
  • Knowledge of Side-Channel Analysis;
  • Experience of designing secure applications and systems using key management and authentication mechanism etc;
  • Experience with systems / applications for secure communication, e.g. VPN, HTTPS;
  • Security review and auditing skills.

Additional Information

You must be an EU or NATO citizen to be eligible for employment at the Cybersecurity Campus Graz.
